titles.title: Fixing the daily hour of meeting of the First Session of the One Hundred Eighth Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since being introduced in the House on January 7, 2003.)Fixes the daily hour of meeting for the House of Representatives for the first session of the 108th Congress. Sets the daily hour, until Monday, May 19, 2003, at: (1) 2 p.m. on Mondays; (3) 12 noon on Tuesdays; and (3) 10 a.m. on all other days of the week.Sets the daily hour from Monday, May 19, 2003, until the end of the first session at: (1) 12 noon on Mondays; (2) 10 a.m. on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays; and (3) 9 a.m. on all other days of the week.
